Баги и баги. Удар прошёл, сурв заорал, а урон не получил(причем не при прыжке через доску, а просто на бегу). Прикольно. И бегай как дятел за ним ещё 10 минут. Весело пздц.

I've had my fun on this game in the past, but if you're wondering about buying this now? Don't. This game is dead, I promise it's not worth your money.

I have been face camped, tunneled, and down right pegged by killers while my team mates point and wave at me on the hook. This game is trash but i will continue to play as it has me by the balls and i cant stop because too many friends still play it.

This game is very fun to play, and a great way to learn teamwork. I like to play as either a support survivor, though that usually gets me killed, or a head on killer, where I use my sheer intimidation and careful planning to mess with survivors.

killers who farm making the game unplayable for survivors. Survivors don't get XP for playing the game properly. Buffed face camping for killers. Survivors are too strong so make it to where its not fun for survivors. Developers who ruin the game.
I like this game so much. I play with my friends and is very cool.

Nice content

If there ever was a game I wish I could have never touched it would be this one
老是老是吞我血点，打的时候根本不卡，一出来就跟我说连不上服务器，我真的服了。刚玩天天被三出四出就算了，好不容易四杀一局还没有血点，你让玩家怎么活？要是是我自己网卡我也认了，可是打的时候一点也不卡，延迟都不高。到目前为止，我应该被吞了三分之一左右的血点了，再这么恶心我真不想玩了。

SkillBasedMatchMaking is Bullshit, Devs dont give flying shit about reports, Playerbase is a toxic pile of scum, the Balanceteam is a lie
if you want competitiv gameplay with shits and toxic levels of salt go for LoL ... at least thats for free, if you really want to pay for crap like that, here you go
for a nice group of players you need to roll a crit on a d20, the rest are just levels of shit

dont get me wrong here, i had my fun and its nice to play with friends or the seemingly 5% players who know some decent behaviour 
the devs could cure this game with just a bit effort but new content is used as opium for the people
Кусок неоптимизированного и несбалансированного говна, читеры через катку....но я почему то в это еще играю :(
It's a fun game. Even though it's very Killer focused.

Honestly this game is just overall not good. The balance between killer and survivor is so awful, some killers are like almost unbeatable it's absurd. I have well over 550 hours in this game and still am like, why do i play this? It's addictive but not really even crazy good, play a  better game.

This game sucks. Quite frankly it is awful. I hate it with a burning passion. Every time I play this game, I want to uninstall it. The player base is idiotic at best and don't even get me started on the console players. The killers are all stupid and unfair. If i get killed while having already vaulted something with an easily fair amount of distance between me and killer, I may lose my mind. I give this game a 0/10. It is in fact the worst game I have ever played and I have played League of Legends. I hate this game. Now if you'll excuse me, I am going back to playing Fortnite.

Game blows 

Update #1 everyone this game sucks and i hate it! have a nice day :)
